messages.subject: Re: Kaze Hikaru Scanlations (problems)
messages.msgSnippet: Well Tiffany says it s working okay.... So how about you try getting a download manager like download accelerator or getright? That way even if you do stop in
messages.messageBody:
Well Tiffany says it's working okay.... So how about you try getting
a download manager like download accelerator or getright? That way
even if you do stop in the middle you can resume the download and not
lose precious minutes (or hours) ^_^

What else? Yes if the download terminates early then when you open it
through your unzip program it will say corrupted or invalid archive.
You can only open it if it's 100% done.

Hope this helps...

~wounds

messages.messageBody:
Hm, I can't seem to download it. The file stops download in the middle
(actually almost right in the beginning), and when I go to the file it says
it's been corrupted, so I can't open it.
Any idea what might be wrong?


Miser Bellatrix

"Allow me to give you a hand...with your doom."

Saitou, who looks like a newborn baby in Kaze Hikaru, appears in

messages.subject: RE: [SHQ] Re: Kaze Hikaru Scanlations - OT
messages.msgSnippet: Ugh, even though I ve never known anything better than dial up, it still is a drag every time I watch the minutes of the estimated download time pile up into
messages.messageBody:
Ugh, even though I've never known anything better than dial up, it still is
a drag every time I watch the minutes of the estimated download time pile up
into hours. I wish I had something like DSL, but blast it, it's not
available in my area. *shakes a fist as the DSL company*
Oh well, one hour and ten minutes to go for the fist chapter. @_@

Thanks for the link, by the way!

Miser Bellatrix

"Allow me to give you a hand...with your doom."


-------------------------------------

> chap. 4. Looks can be deceiving...folks please hurry up and
> download o.k. :)
>
> http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/fiction.html


Okay just wanted to wail a little.... Lost my DSL for almost a month
now... Using dial up in the meantime.... WHY? OH WHY? DOES ALL THE
GOOD STUFF COME OUT WHEN MY DSL IS NOT AVAILABLE? Take for example
these scanlations (AND MANY THANKS TIFFANY! REALLY APPRECIATE THIS),
how many hours to download... Then I missed out on the bittorent for
the shinsengumi episode... Then I can't download musashi episode
19.... T_T T_T T_T

Still, I will go and download (these scanlations) regardless......

~wounds

Kaze Hikaru is a manga by Watanabe Taeko

scanlations by http://ghost-hunt.net/lost-heaven

Okita did alot of technical mumbo jumbo

I used winzip and uploaded the files to

http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/fiction.html

<these files will not be on this page forever...I had nowhere else
to put them so I put them on this in progress site temporarily>

Please keep this "arrangement" amongst ourselves for now...if there
are problems just email me (I've never used winzip before) or I can
email the files to you but they are large 35 mb total but can be
split up into 4 installments.

Again, everyone pat the capt of the 1st squad on the back




visit
